entry.title: Afterdie/octops
entry.summary: Octops: An open-source Python/Kivy-based point-and-click puzzle game inspired by CS 1.6. Features four screens: Site A (3x3 button grid), Site B (hint-based), Doors (numeric puzzle), and Spawn (sliders). Solve puzzles to defuse the bomb. Join our open-source community to enhance gameplay, UI, and storytelling.
